summary: THE PASSENGER-SIDE AIRBAG DOES NOT ALWAYS ACTIVATE WHEN THERE IS AN ADULT PASSENGER IN THAT SEAT.  THE INDICATOR LIGHT COMES ON ABOUT 50-60% OF THE TIME (INDICATING THAT THE AIRBAG WILL NOT DEPLOY IN THE EVENT OF A COLLISION) WHICH PUTS THAT PASSENGER AT A HEIGHTENED RISK FOR SERIOUS INJURY, OR DEATH.  *TR
